Description:
Detects the creation of a new office macro files on the systems

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Office Macro File Creation
Query: sourcetype="windows-sysmon" (filepath="*.docm" OR filepath="*.dotm" OR filepath="*.xlsm" OR filepath="*.xltm" OR filepath="*.potm" OR filepath="*.pptm")
